body: Had a standard day. Asked a big boob cheerleader for her number. Got a promotion. Finished a good movie. Sensual ass movie. "Evocative," as people like my mom say. Also wrote three poems and some zany prose. Sober, one day at a time. Poor dude, the 'old' guy in this movie. 19!? That guy looks 45 years old. Weird how little this movie has to say given how much it postures. Well directed.
author: Max Berengaut
title: Knife in the Water
actors: Leon Niemczyk, Jolanta Umecka, Zygmunt Malanowicz
screenwriter: Roman Polanski, Jakub Goldberg, Jerzy Skolimowski
